titleStmt.title: [The] Drunkards dyall, or, [Go]od Sir, your nose is durty ... to the tune of Riding to Rumford.

notesStmt.note: Right half sheet contains "The second part. to [sic] the sam[e tune]," and imprint.
Imperfect: cropped and torn with loss of text. Bracketed material from STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
